name: Mech's Need Love Lives Too
description:
Demanded by a poll ...A mech Dating Sim!!
Mechs Need Love Lives Too!
Aioh our lonely little pest control mech tires of the mundane day-to-day tasks, when its wingman suggests to it to try dating! Follow Aioh on an adventure of a lifetime, traversing the world of dating aaaand balancing his day job in Mechs Need Love Lives Too!
To be Continued!

Feel free to leave suggestions and criticisms
